attributes.action: To alow children to have free use of toilets in school
attributes.additional_details: To loft this rule as it’s against human rights to not have free will to use toilets
attributes.background: Lately in high schools toilets are being shut during lessons. Children can only use toilets during breaks and lunch

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual schools and teachers. Decisions on policies regarding when students can leave the classroom are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
